title: Ticket #1929: create a tool for testing matches
description: We estimate demand for resources in CHTC and GLOW. We currently do this using a tool I wrote called condor_test_match, but I still need to check it in. It takes a file of machine ads and a file of job ads and efficiently reports the number of machines matched by the jobs. It can also be used to see which machines and jobs do not match.
check_ins: 2011-Feb-25 18:13   Check-in [20771]: Added condor_test_match. #1929 This tool is useful for checking how many machines are matched by a set of jobs. (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
